articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Natasha Bertrand, Priscilla Alvarez
articles.title: Ukraine faces a daunting winter after Zelensky can’t convince Republicans to move quickly on new aid - CNN
articles.description: Standing alongside his Ukrainian counterpart at the White House a little more than a year ago, President Joe Biden vowed American support for Ukraine “as long as it takes.” It’s a commitment he’s long repeated in the 22 months since Russia’s unprovoked invasi…
